original_text: And the priest shall offer the sin offering, and make an atonement for him that is to be cleansed from his uncleanness; and afterward he shall kill the burnt offering:
korean_text: 또 제사장은 속죄제를 드려 그 부정함으로 말미암아 정결함을 받을 자를 위하여 속죄하고 그 후에 번제물을 잡을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall offer the sin offering
and make an atonement for him
that is to be cleansed from his uncleanness
sentences.korean_translation: 그 부정함에서 정결하게 될 자를 위하여

sentences.original_text: and afterward he shall kill the burnt offering
